title: Conquest in Eä V – Event Organisation and Review
description: General Cross talks about running and playing in his latest Conquest event post-FAQ.

title: Competitive Innovations in the Mortal Realms: Cold Weather, Hot Games
description: We take a look at the big events for Age of Sigmar last weekend, talk about what worked, and how the meta is developing.

title: That 6+++ Show Episode 77: Room 101 40k Edition
description: Tom is joined by Ed, Jack and Scrivo to talk through which elements of 40k they’d like thrown into Room 101 (or a giant pit never to be seen or heard of again). title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: Silver Tide pt.1
description: Welp, it’s finally happened, this week we’re going to three parts. That’s because the past weekend was an absolutely astounding blowout of 40K, featuring ~1200 players participating in 16 GT+ events (around half of them majors) and that doesn’t even account for there being at least three major+ sized team events happening across Europe. That’s so much […]
